001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
010import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service.PlayingFieldRepository;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
015import javax.inject.Inject;
016import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
017
018@HiltViewModel
019public class GameFieldViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
020
021  private static final String TAG = GameFieldViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
022  private final PlayingFieldRepository playingFieldRepository;
023  private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> running;
024  private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> inProgress;
025  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
026  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
027  private double gravity;
028  private double velocity;
029  private int angle;
030
031  @Inject
032  GameFieldViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context,
033      PlayingFieldRepository playingFieldRepository) {
034    this.playingFieldRepository = playingFieldRepository;
035    running = new MutableLiveData<>();
036    inProgress = new MutableLiveData<>();
037    this.throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
038    this.pending = new CompositeDisposable();
039    create();
040  }
041
042  public void create() {
043    playingFieldRepository.create();
044  }
045
046  public void run() {
047    playingFieldRepository
048        .run()
049        .subscribe(
050            inProgress::postValue,
051            this::postThrowable,
052            () -> {
053              // TODO: 11/16/23 Take appropriate action for the game paused.
054            },
055            pending
056        );
057  }
058
059  public void paused() {
060    playingFieldRepository.pause();
061  }
062
063  public LiveData<GameField> getGameField() {
064    return playingFieldRepository.getLiveGameField();
065  }
066
067  public LiveData<Boolean> getRunning() {
068    return running;
069  }
070
071  public LiveData<Boolean> getInProgress() {
072    return inProgress;
073  }
074
075  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
076    return throwable;
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  public void onPause(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
081    playingFieldRepository.pause();
082    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onPause(owner);
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public void onStop(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
087    pending.clear();
088    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
089  }
090
091  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
092    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
093    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
094  }
095
096
097  public boolean isGameOver() {
098    return playingFieldRepository.isGameOver();
099  }
100
101  public void setGravity(double gravity) {
102    playingFieldRepository.setGravity(gravity);
103  }
104
105  public void setVelocity(double velocity) {
106    playingFieldRepository.setVelocity(velocity);
107  }
108
109  public void setAngle(int angle) {
110    playingFieldRepository.setAngle(angle);
111  }
112
113  public void shipMoveUp() {
114    playingFieldRepository.shipMoveUp();
115  }
116
117  public void shipMoveDown() {
118    playingFieldRepository.shipMoveDown();
119  }
120
121  public void shoot() {
122    playingFieldRepository.shoot();
123  }
124}
